attributes.action: apologise to the illegally expelled Child Migrants of the era 1947 thru to 1967 as many of them are now passing, or have passed away .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that the PM of Britain extends an apology to the rejected indigenous children that were forcibly sent to Aust and who were almost immediately replaced by Jamacians and Asians beginning June 22nd 1948 with the arrival of the ' Empire Windrush ' from the Caribbean .The expelled children have proven that their childhoods were an abomination at the hands of their selected guardians in Australia . Many committed suicide due directly from their treatment within Bindoon, Clontarf, Castledare, and Tardun Boys Homes.
